snippet.title: Teaser - Beneath our Scars - Visual Novel game
snippet.description:
Beneath our Scars is a free romance visual novel currently in development ! 
Follow us at : 
https://www.beneathourscars.com

This game takes place in a private clinic and depicts the blooming love story between Melinda and Rowan.
Your choices matter and will allow you to build and help their relationship evolve. Make the best decisions to unlock illustrations during the story ! 

What to expect :
Romance : ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Spicy :  🍆⚪️⚪️⚪️
Serious Drama : 🔥⚪️⚪️⚪️

Available langages : French & English

music by Peritune 
https://peritune.com/
